data: Reginald Philip Graham Thursford | Baron Travers | Marquis of Mandeleys

Reginald Philip Graham Thursford, Baron Travers, Marquis of Mandeleys, issued, one May morning, from the gloomy precincts of the Law Courts without haste, yet with certain evidences of a definite desire to leave the place behind him.
